      public double calcPureComponentSurfaceTension(int componentNumber)

      Calculates the pure component surfacetension.

      using the Macleod/Sugden method

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

    • calcSurfaceTension

      public double calcSurfaceTension(int interface1, int interface2)

      Calculates the surface tension between two phases.

      Using the Firozabadi Ramley (1988) method for mixtures Units: N/m

      Specified by:
      calcSurfaceTension in interface SurfaceTensionInterface
      Overrides:
      calcSurfaceTension in class SurfaceTension
      Parameters:
      interface1 - Phase index 1
      interface2 - Phase index 2
      Returns:
      Surface tension in N/m
